name: keygen
title: Keygen
description: Manage Licenses, Policies, Products and Users
author: xmok

preferences.name: api_token
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Admin Token generated via Keygen API

commands.name: api-usage
commands.title: API Usage
commands.subtitle: Keygen
commands.description: Check current API usage statistics and limits

commands.name: licenses
commands.title: View Licenses
commands.subtitle: Keygen
commands.description: List Licenses and Create new ones

commands.name: policies
commands.title: View Policies
commands.subtitle: Keygen
commands.description: View Policies and Create new ones

commands.name: products
commands.title: View Products
commands.subtitle: Keygen
commands.description: List Products and Create new ones

commands.name: users
commands.title: View Users
commands.subtitle: Keygen
commands.description: List Users and Create new ones

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
